name: Stardust Lingers
description:
When Mira arrives back at the cabin now abandoned, searching for clues among memories and manuscripts, she finds an unexpected friend in the form of a bunny with a fuzzy black coat. After speaking to it about her troubles, she realizes that it isn't just the bunny who has been listening...

A visual novel project made for the 2020 Game Off Jam!

Controls

Space/Left Mouse Click on Text: Advances the text.

L: Brings up the log.

Escape: Menu and options.

To load a saved game, you can do so from the options menu on the title screen.  We will add a continue button in future updates.

Credits

Zelveri Lunari : Direction, art, & writing

Bruno Almeida: Music & sound effects

Raphael: Programming
